page.title: 02Wetwang,Farming.
page.content: Most of the farming in this area is arable farming with a few beef cattle.When you look in the fields in the summer you can see lots of colours where the crops make a patchwork pattern of the view. The whole of Wetwang is surrounded by fields.The crops grown are wheat,barley,oil seed rape,sugar beet,potatoes,peas,turnips and swedes. The main part of the farmer's year is harvest.Sometimes they work from 8am.to 11pm.They have to eat sandwiches most of the time. Once the harvest is over the fields are baled or burned and then ploughed.Depending on the weather the field might be rolled,dragged,harrowed or riffled.Then the field is drilled,that puts the seed in,and after it has slug pellets planted and then is sprayed against diseases.
